Procedural/Factual Step: Property transfer via quitclaim deed for Lot 2B
Meta Meaning/Summary: Sets stage for future development attempts

Procedural/Factual Step: RDA submission by GLM Engineering of Hopkinton, ALL DOCUMENTS MISSING
Legal Meaning/Summary: Initial attempt to establish wetland boundaries
Meta Meaning/Summary: Developer's opening move to minimize regulated areas

Legal Meaning/Summary: Formal request for wetland boundary confirmation
Meta Meaning/Summary: Attempt to lock in favorable delineation before development

Procedural/Factual Step: First GEC site visit for peer review
Legal Meaning/Summary: Town hires consultant to verify delineation

Procedural/Factual Step: GEC presents findings: dam 60 years old, Mill Brook is perennial, potential vernal pools
WCC unanimously finds delineation inaccurate with 5-10 foot differences; Goddard withdraws from town bylaw review
Meta Meaning/Summary: Strategic withdrawal to avoid local authority

Procedural/Factual Step: WCC issues ORAD finding BVW delineation inaccurate and Mill Brook as perennial stream
Meta Meaning/Summary: Perennial stream means much larger buffer zones

Procedural/Factual Step: Delapa appeals claiming intermittent stream based on 4 photos from Sept 2014 (photos not in appeal)
Attorney Watsky requests dealing with town attorney directly
MassDEP conducts site visit (2 additional visits dates unknown)
Goddard attorney threatens Superior Court if bylaw review not removed; Watsky states suit filed
Survey plan by Hoyt Land Surveying for 44 Mill St
GEC evaluation confirms dam 60 years old, Mill Brook perennial, potential vernal pools
ANR Plan for 44 Mill St (Map 28 Lot 14) filed with Town Clerk
Legal Meaning/Summary: Attempt to create buildable lot without subdivision

Procedural/Factual Step: ANR declared incomplete - vital access not demonstrated
Applicant submits additional materials same day
Planning Board determines land constitutes subdivision - ANR not endorsed
Meta Meaning/Summary: Major setback - must go through full subdivision

Procedural/Factual Step: Correspondence from Nora Loughnane to Planning Board
Notice to abutters from attorney Buckley
DEP Superseding Order of Conditions with highlights
DEP denies SORAD - Mill Brook confirmed perennial, site in wellhead protection area
Legal Meaning/Summary: State confirms WCC findings on stream
Meta Meaning/Summary: But opens door for future development with conditions

Procedural/Factual Step: DEP issues Final Order of Resource Area Delineation
Meta Meaning/Summary: Developer partially wins - gets defined boundaries

Procedural/Factual Step: DEP Final Decision issuing FORAD, expires Dec 19 2022 with extension
Legal Meaning/Summary: Final boundaries set with time limit

Procedural/Factual Step: Commission signs ORAD for bylaw approval per 11/9/16 Executive Session agreement
Rachel Freed attests FORAD is true copy in DEP file
Property transferred to Vinci via quitclaim

Property sale record Salvatore to Delapa

Hearing continued due to notification failure
Revised NOI Form 3 with July 3 2021 date

Procedural/Factual Step: WCC meeting where denial decision made
WCC denies OOC finding project cannot meet performance standards, cites 550 sq ft wetland fill
Legal Meaning/Summary: Formal denial based on environmental impact

Procedural/Factual Step: Appeal to DEP claiming project meets standards with 700 sq ft replication for 550 sq ft fill
Legal Meaning/Summary: Seeks state override of local denial

Procedural/Factual Step: DEP schedules site visit for SOC review
DEP site visit with applicant, WCC rep, and peer reviewer present
DEP requests quantification of BLSF impacts and flood storage per 310 CMR 10.57(4)
Goddard submits response with revised plans dated Jan 31, 2022
DEP requests cut and fill table as per Jan 11 request
Legal Meaning/Summary: DEP follows up on missing info

Procedural/Factual Step: DEP requests clarification on inconsistent floodplain elevations
Response with new revised plans dated March 8, 2022
Peer reviewer and WCC administrator exchange

Signed MOU: WCC accepts SOC, dam repair required, building permit after dam NOI filed
NOI for dam restoration filed per settlement
